entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
